item.title: Firstpost from Hugo
item.description: Hi!! If you are stopping by this page, it’s really nice of you to drop by, Thank you! It has been a while, like a few years, since I wanted to write and maintain a blog. I had spent close these few years thinking, scribbling and rethinking of what I would want to write about, while my vocabulary witnessed a gradual degradation in the context of an operating system. In those four years, I had been building some awesome things, mostly as part of my courserwork but now that I think about them, I lost most of my notes working on them.

item.title: About
item.description: I am currently working with the Centre for Networked Intelligence at the Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore, India. Prior to my current position, I completed my masters in Computer Science (August 2019) with a specialization in Data Science and Technology from the Web Information Systems group, at the Delft University of Technology under the supervision of Prof. Dr. ir. Alessandro Bozzon. I hold a B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (2016) from Amrita University, Coimbatore.

item.title: Projects
item.description: I enjoy dabbling on code and some of them end-up mini-projects, some get listed but others can be checked out on Github. I believe that getting your hands dirty helps you learn the tool faster, and sometime I write about my experieces on my blog Featured Project An city-scale agent-based simulator to compare different intervention strategies during an epidemic: Code on Github A hybrid human-machine approach to preserve privacy in images: Code - coming soon!
